snippet: Alarmed by Russia’s intervention in Ukraine, the governing parties back closer ties to the West, while the opposition looks to Moscow for balance.
abstract: Latvia's governing center-right coalition parties appears to win majority of seats in parliamentary election dominated by security issues and the Ukraine crisis.
lead_paragraph: Alarmed by Russia’s intervention in Ukraine, the governing parties back closer ties to the West, while the opposition looks to Moscow for balance.

headline.main: Center-Right Coalition Leads in Latvian Parliament Vote
headline.print_headline: Center-Right Coalition Leads in Latvian Parliament Vote
